book.synopsis: In Salthill-on-Hudson, a half-hour train ride from Manhattan, everyone is rich, beautiful, and -- though they look much younger -- middle-aged. But when Adam Berendt, a charismatic, mysterious sculptor, dies suddenly in a brash act of heroism, shock waves rock the town. But who was Adam Berendt? Was he in fact a hero, or someone more flawed and human?
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5.31 Inches, Weight: 0.81 Pounds, Width: 1.08 Inches
